mapper.select: SELECT parts_info.*, userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson.`name` AS sendbackConfirmedPersonName from parts_info LEFT JOIN user as userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson ON userOfSendbackConfirmedPerson.id = parts_info.sendback_confirmed_person LEFT JOIN repair_actual_info as rai ON rai.id = parts_info.repair_actual_info_id LEFT JOIN repair_record as rr ON rr.id = rai.repair_record_id WHERE rr.id = #{repairRecordId}
